name: Ready or Not (itch) (fuller654)
description:
Ready or Not is a game about a younger sister who is playing a game with her older brother. As the day goes on, Callie still can't find her brother. She asks around town if any of the villagers have seen him, and they all say the same thing, no. But some of them might have clues or tools to help her with her journey. 

Background assets from: MoneyAssets on itch.io and put together by Kayla Fuller

Characters made by Kayla Fuller

Items made by Kayla Fuller (note & phone)

Items from Kenny Assets (key & license)

Programming done by Jenna Cain
